attributes.review: To all my fellow Trump supporters, DONT GET THIS APP!!!! It is made by terrible snowflakes to steal your information. Look in the app settings and it will show that your location is being used. This information is being sent to the lefties so they know how to beat our president. DO NOT GET THIS APP. I REPEAT DO NOT GET THIS APP.
attributes.title: FAKE APP DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: It’s horrible how much hate people can have on one man smh
attributes.title: I love this app

attributes.review:
TRUMP 2020!!! 
this app is literally so bad it made my phone all glitchy so I put my phone down to walk my sock and when I came back there was CHEETO DUST EVERYWHERE IN MY ROOM it was only me in the house idk what happened but then my phone started to get glitchy
attributes.title: He needs to upgrade his app

attributes.review: Do not download this app. Absolute trash. I downloaded it A while ago and the app was very glitchy. So glitchy that my phone started playing random music from Cardi B. 🤮This Only happenes when I use this app. So like I was saying don’t get this app!!!
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: I would never recommend this app! It’s terrible and should be deleted it took 2 weeks to download and when I finally got into the app it crashed I hope apple deletes this from the store.
attributes.title: Terrible the worst app!

attributes.review: THIS APP IS TRASH!!! It was very confusing, drained the battery on my phone rather quickly, and crashed my phone on MULTIPLE occasions. It’s information is also false advertisement and will corrupt young people’s mind. This is a terrible app. I hate it !!!
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible

attributes.review: Just another spam. They send you 60 messages a day that are very problematic and racist. This app is for communists. I’ve never been more disappointed in my iPhone for letting me download this. Kim Jong un’s Christmas gift should have been the deletion of this app.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I got porn adds before this app! I have never been so disgusted and shocked before in my life. The man looked the an under developed fetus that was dropped in cheto dust! My virgin eyes were screaming. The add even said “grab them by the p*ssy”.  A disgrace. 10/10 would delete again.
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review:
All I wanted to do was support my president 🇺🇸 in all he does. This app took five days to download and its still not workin right 😭 
Now it’s makin my phone glitchy and says its takin up all my storage. Them dems probably hacked it!! Take down this app to protect all trump supporters
attributes.title: Horrible 😣😣😣
